languages.text: Иокаста Зауэрбэк много лет служила Вольному Торговцу Мастером дисциплины. Возглавляя орду бесноватых блюстителей, она высаживалась на миры и станции, чтобы силой угнать на борт новое пополнение экипажа. Тех, кто осмеливался дать отпор, она безжалостно забивала до смерти своей булавой. Тех, кто покорялся ей, более никто и никогда не встречал. Каждая высадка прибавляла шрамы на ее суровое лицо, пока вскоре оно не скрылось совсем в месиве старых отметин, на котором горела пара исполненных ненависти глаз. Леди Зауэрбэк получила устрашающее прозвище Госпожа шрамов.

Jocasta Sauerback served as the Rogue Trader's Master-at-Arms for many years. At the head of a horde of frenzied enforcers, she landed on worlds and boarded stations to replenish the ship's crew with new captives. If any dared resist, she would beat them to death with her merciless maul. Those who submitted to her were never seen again. Each landing and boarding added scars to her stern face, until it disappeared completely behind a riot of old wounds with only a pair of eyes on it, ablaze with hatred. She earned the fearsome sobriquet: the Lady of Scars.
languages.original_text: Иокаста Зауэрбэк много лет служила Вольному Торговцу Мастером дисциплины. languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback diente {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} viele Jahre als Waffenmeisterin. An der Spitze einer Horde fanatischer Enforcer landete sie auf Welten und Stationen, um die Crew des Schiffs mit neuen Gefangenen zu erneuern. Wer sich ihr widersetzte, machte tödliche Bekanntschaft mit ihrem unerbittlichen Hammer. Wer sich ihr unterwarf, wurde nie mehr gesehen. Jede Operation hinterließ weitere Narben auf ihrem gestrengen Gesicht, bis es vollständig unter einer Maske aus alten Wunden und zwei hasserfüllten Augen verschwand. Sie erhielt den Furcht erregenden Beinamen "Herrin der Narben".
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as the Rogue Trader's Master-at-Arms for many years. At the head of a horde of frenzied enforcers, she landed on worlds and boarded stations to replenish the ship's crew with new captives. If any dared resist, she would beat them to death with her merciless maul. Those who submitted to her were never seen again. Each landing and boarding added scars to her stern face, until it disappeared completely behind a riot of old wounds with only a pair of eyes on it, ablaze with hatred. She earned the fearsome sobriquet: the Lady of Scars.

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback servit {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en tant que capitaine d'armes pendant de longues années. À la tête d'une horde de prévôts enragés, elle organisa des rafles sur de nombreux mondes et stations afin de regarnir les rangs de l'équipage. Si les captifs avaient l'audace de résister, elle les battait à mort avec sa masse meurtrière. Quant à ceux qui se soumettaient, ils disparaissent définitivement de la circulation. À chaque raid, elle s'en revenait le visage couturé de nouvelles plaies, jusqu'à ce que ses traits disparaissent complètement derrière un masque de cicatrices plus ou moins anciennes, dont seuls ressortaient ses yeux brûlant de haine. C'est ainsi qu'elle gagna le redoutable sobriquet de Dame aux Cicatrices.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as the Rogue Trader's Master-at-Arms for many years. At the head of a horde of frenzied enforcers, she landed on worlds and boarded stations to replenish the ship's crew with new captives. If any dared resist, she would beat them to death with her merciless maul. Those who submitted to her were never seen again. Each landing and boarding added scars to her stern face, until it disappeared completely behind a riot of old wounds with only a pair of eyes on it, ablaze with hatred. She earned the fearsome sobriquet: the Lady of Scars.

Si les captifs avaient l'audace de résister, elle les battait à mort avec sa masse meurtrière. Quant à ceux qui se soumettaient, ils disparaissent définitivement de la circulation. C'est ainsi qu'elle gagna le redoutable sobriquet de Dame aux Cicatrices.

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback sirvió a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente como maestra de armas durante muchos años. Al mando de sus frenéticos agentes de seguridad, aterrizaba en mundos y abordaba estaciones para reponer la tripulación de la nave con nuevos prisioneros. Si alguno osaba resistirse, lo aporreaba con su maza hasta matarlo. Quienes se sometían a ella nunca volvían a ser vistos. En cada aterrizaje y abordaje acumulaba nuevas cicatrices en su severo rostro, que quedó convertido en un amasijo de viejas heridas en el que ardían dos ojos llenos de odio. La gente la conocía por su temido apodo: La Dama de las Cicatrices.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as the Rogue Trader's Master-at-Arms for many years. At the head of a horde of frenzied enforcers, she landed on worlds and boarded stations to replenish the ship's crew with new captives. Si alguno osaba resistirse, lo aporreaba con su maza hasta matarlo. Quienes se sometían a ella nunca volvían a ser vistos. En cada aterrizaje y abordaje acumulaba nuevas cicatrices en su severo rostro, que quedó convertido en un amasijo de viejas heridas en el que ardían dos ojos llenos de odio. La gente la conocía por su temido apodo: La Dama de las Cicatrices.

languages.text: ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックは長年にわたってローグトレーダーのマスター・アット・アームとして務めた。熱狂的なエンフォーサーの先頭に立ち、彼女は新たな捕虜を船に補充していくためにさまざまな惑星に降り立ち、ステーションへと乗り込んだ。抵抗する者がいれば、容赦なくモールで殴り殺す。降伏したものの前には二度と姿を現わさない。着陸や搭乗の旅に、彼女の厳しい顔には傷跡が刻まれた。その傷跡が完全に消えるころには、憎悪に燃える一対の目だけが残った。彼女は「傷痕の貴婦人」という恐ろし気な二つ名を獲得した。
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as the Rogue Trader's Master-at-Arms for many years. At the head of a horde of frenzied enforcers, she landed on worlds and boarded stations to replenish the ship's crew with new captives. If any dared resist, she would beat them to death with her merciless maul. Those who submitted to her were never seen again. Each landing and boarding added scars to her stern face, until it disappeared completely behind a riot of old wounds with only a pair of eyes on it, ablaze with hatred. She earned the fearsome sobriquet: the Lady of Scars.

traits.locale_text: ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックは長年にわたってローグトレーダーのマスター・アット・アームとして務めた。熱狂的なエンフォーサーの先頭に立ち、彼女は新たな捕虜を船に補充していくためにさまざまな惑星に降り立ち、ステーションへと乗り込んだ。抵抗する者がいれば、容赦なくモールで殴り殺す。降伏したものの前には二度と姿を現わさない。着陸や搭乗の旅に、彼女の厳しい顔には傷跡が刻まれた。その傷跡が完全に消えるころには、憎悪に燃える一対の目だけが残った。彼女は「傷痕の貴婦人」という恐ろし気な二つ名を獲得した。

languages.text: 多年来，约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克一直担任着行商浪人的戒律大师。她会带着一大群疯狂的执法者，降落在无数世界，登上无数星站，抓来许多新的俘虏，为旗舰补充船员。如果有人敢反抗，她就会用她那无情的战锤将反抗者活活打死，至于那些臣服于她的人，便再也没有人见过它们。每次着陆时，她那张阴沉的脸上都会添上新的疤痕，直到所有新伤都融入在无数旧伤之中，只剩下两只眼睛闪烁着仇恨的光芒。由此，她赢得了这个可怕的绰号：伤痕女士。
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback served as the Rogue Trader's Master-at-Arms for many years. At the head of a horde of frenzied enforcers, she landed on worlds and boarded stations to replenish the ship's crew with new captives. If any dared resist, she would beat them to death with her merciless maul. Those who submitted to her were never seen again. Each landing and boarding added scars to her stern face, until it disappeared completely behind a riot of old wounds with only a pair of eyes on it, ablaze with hatred. She earned the fearsome sobriquet: the Lady of Scars.
